SELECT appoint.id AS id, appoint.appoint_id AS appoint_id, user.avatar_url AS avatar, user.username AS username, appoint.create_time AS create_time, appoint.appoint_time AS appoint_time, appoint.content AS content,
scope.content AS scope, skill.content AS skill, certificate.content AS certificate FROM appoint JOIN `user` ON appoint.appoint_id = user.id JOIN scope ON appoint.appoint_id = scope.user_id JOIN skill ON appoint.appoint_id = skill.user_id JOIN certificate ON appoint.appoint_id = certificate.user_id WHERE appoint.status = 0 AND appoint.appoint_status = 1 AND user.user_status = 1 AND scope.scope_status = 1 AND skill.skill_status = 1 AND certificate.certificate_status = 1
and user.username like '%${name}%'
and scope.content like '%${city}%'
and skill.content like '%${skill}%'
and appoint.appoint_time like '%${time}%'
LIMIT #{page}, #{num}
